text: tae anak min bankheunh te ryy tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh ku trauv anak del now leumekh cheachraen chean ning phendei promteang preahatity ning preahchnt ning hvaung phkay ning phnom ning daemchheu neanea ning satv theato teangoasa ning mnoussa lok pheakochraen saou chout champoh trong noh? haey( mnoussa lok)pheakochraen ku trauv ttuol tearounakamm . haey anaknea del trauv a l laoh thveu aoy ke ameasamoukh ku kmean anaknea leuk tamkeung ke laey . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh thveu nouv avei del trong mean chetnea
